com.illumina.basespace

Class FetchParams

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.illumina.basespace.FetchParams
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FileFetchParams, VariantFetchParams

    public class FetchParams
extends Object
    A set of parameters which limit the scope of a retrieved list
    Author:
    bking
